thread.title: BRIEF-Apptio Inc Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.19

title: BRIEF-Apptio Inc Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.19
text:
April 30, 2018 / 8:37 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Apptio Inc Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.19 Reuters Staff
 Apptio Inc: * APPTIO ANNOUNCES RESULTS FOR THE FIRST QUARTER 2018
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.00 * Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.19
* Q1 REVENUE $54.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $51.7 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.06 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $55 MILLION TO $56 MILLION
* SEES Q2 NON-GAAP OPERATING LOSS BETWEEN $0.5 AND $1.0 MILLION
* SEES POSITIVE NON-GAAP OPERATING INCOME FOR FULL YEAR 2018
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $223.1 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 REVENUE VIEW $53.6 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
